The Holy Vigil was a religious ceremony observed by worshipers of Helm, He of the Unsleeping Eyes.
Holy Vigils were observed when a priest within the Church of Helm ascended to a higher rank within the clergy. The priest participated in a time of deep concentration where they kept their weapon afloat in the air throughout the night. The weapon was enchanted to float by a fellow priest, but only the ascending priests constant vigilance kept it afloat through the night.
